p: A total of 509,164 cumulative confirmed cases and 23,335 deaths had been documented globally as of March 27, 2020. Italy, the United States and Spain were the three countries with the most cases of COVID-19 outside of China. Moreover, Italy, Spain and Iran had the most deaths of COVID-19 outside of China. The average temperatures ranged from −5.28 to 34.30 °C, and the average relative humidity ranged from 11.39% to 88.42% ( Fig. 1 ).
